p: This study considered a vertically integrated model, i.e., a company controls both the agricultural and industrial production systems. In this sense, the biomass production cost in the agricultural phase, which is an output of the CanaSoft model, will be interpreted as the cost of biomass in the industrial cash flow analysis instead of considering sugarcane market prices [ 28]. This assumption is important because the management decisions regarding agricultural technologies to be used in the sugarcane field will impact the entire production chain, including the ethanol production costs at the industry.
